greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Squares whose consecutive digits differ by 1.
comment: a(14), if it exists, is > 10^34. - _Lars Blomberg_, Nov 25 2016
Is it true that all terms are palindromes? - _Chai Wah Wu_, Apr 06 2018
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 10^7]^2, Or[# == 0, IntegerLength@ # == 1, Union@ Abs@ Differences@ IntegerDigits@ # == {1}] &] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 25 2016 *)
xref: Cf. A010052; intersection of A033075 and A000290.
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Apr 15 1999
